title: Supreme Authority
alternative_title: Bug (Zhao Yiren) ; Highest Scope of Authority ; Supreme Authority ; Supreme Privileges ; 最高权限
status: Bug (Zhao Yiren) ; Highest Scope of Authority ; Supreme Authority ; Supreme Privileges ; 最高权限
description:
Description :
        Sophomore Wang Dachuan unfortunately suffered an accident where his head was pierced by a cell phone, turning him into a BUG syndrome patient. He subsequently encountered Wei Wei, a domineering female superior from a secret organization, forcing him to get involved in a series of bizarre BUG missions. Through these missions, he gradually uncovers the hidden dominion behind this world.
